attributes.action: Scrap the council tax for Old Age Pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
OAP`s have paid income tax all of their working lives and should be exempt from this tax in their later years.

If you were to abolish this unfair tax, older people will be able to lead a happier life.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the council tax for Old Age Pensioners."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
